about_the_game:
Merrymaker Survivors Chest, Part II

The winter winds blow and bring a frosty chill to the air. Raise your spirits, embrace the weather, and prepare for a feast with some fine Merrymaker attire.

Season’s Feastings!

Includes
  • Wilson's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Willow's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Wormwood's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Wurt's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Wanda's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Wickerbottom's Merrymaker Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This Merrymaker Chest contains the second addition to the Merrymaker skin series. Contains skins for: Wilson, Willow, Wormwood, Wurt, Wanda, and Wickerbottom.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
